BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check the data and try again.
UNAUTHORIZED: Your session has expired. Please restart the Mini App.
UNPROCESSABLE: We could not process this request.
RATE_LIMITED: Too many requests. Please try again later.
INTERNAL: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
CSV_MAPPING_ERROR: CSV mapping failed. Check the column configuration.
SELL_EXCEEDS_POSITION: Sell quantity exceeds your current position.
IMPORT_BY_URL_DISABLED: Import by URL is temporarily unavailable.
CHAOS_INJECTED: Chaos testing triggered an error. Please retry.
BILLING_APPLY_FAILED: We could not apply the payment. Please contact support.
